READYCHECK.DialogContentReadyCheck: Your GM has has intiated a Ready Check. Click the button below when you're ready to play!
READYCHECK.DialogContentStatusUpdate: Please select an option below to update your ready status.
READYCHECK.ErrorNotGM: Only GMs may initiate ready checks.
READYCHECK.GmDialogContent: What action would you like to perform?
READYCHECK.SettingsChatMessagesForChecks: Toggle this on to display a chat message when a player responds to a ready check.
READYCHECK.SettingsChatMessagesForUserUp: Toggle this on to display a chat message when a player changes their ready status while no ready check is active.
READYCHECK.SettingsPlayAlertForChecksTit: Play Alert When Ready Check Starts
READYCHECK.SettingsPlayAlertForChecksHin: Toggle this on to play a sound when a ready check is started.
READYCHECK.SettingsCheckAlertSoundPathHi: Enter the path of the sound to play when a ready check is started. Leaving this blank will play the default ring sound.
READYCHECK.UiGmButton: Initiate Ready Check or Change Ready Status
